title: Start
body:
<<move Aig StageLeft2>><<move Lee StageRight2>>
<<outfit Lee Casual>>
<<outfit Aig Casual>>
<<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<expression Aig Neutral>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
Hey Aigburth.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Sup.
<<name Friendship Lee>>
It seems like you're really working hard lately. Good job.
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yeah! Thanks!
<<name Friendship Lee>>
But just a reminder, you shouldn't be neglecting the other parts of your training. 
The company still wants us to be well-rounded, to an extent.
->Ugh, really?
    <<expression Aig Angry>>
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Ugh, really?
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<statDown Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Angry>>
    Yeah, really.
->Sure thing.
    <<name Friendship Aig>>
    Yeah, sure thing.
    <<name Friendship Lee>>
    <<expression Lee Happy>>
    <<statUp Friendship Lee>>
    Thanks, man.
    I know it's kind of a pain.
    <<expression Lee Neutral>>
<<name Friendship Lee>>
You know that I'm no good at promoting myself, but I still gotta try.
Same goes for you--even if you don't think you're good at something, you should at least work on it a little.
They're not gonna take it easy on you just because you're the youngest, you know?
<<name Friendship Aig>>
Yeah, yeah.
